text: Paul Chittilapilly (27 February 1934 - 6 September 2020) was an Indian Syro- Malabar Catholic prelate. He was bishop of the Syro-Malabar Catholic Church. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1961. He was bishop of the Syro-Malabar Catholic Eparchy of Kalyan, India, from 1988 to 1996 and as bishop of the Syro-Malabar Catholic Eparchy of Thamarassery, India, from 1996 to 2010. Chittilapilly died on 6 September 2020, aged 86.Syro-Malabar Epachy of Thamarasserry ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Eastern Catholic bishops
title: Paul Chittilapilly
